text: The Cook () is a 1965 Soviet comedy movie directed by Edmond Keosayan.Что случилось со Светланой Светличной?СТРЯПУХА It stars Svetlana Svetlichnaya, Lyudmila Khityaeva, and Inna Churikova. == Actors == * Svetlana Svetlichnaya as Pavlina Khutornaya * Lyudmila Khityaeva as Galina Sakhno * Georgi Yumatov as Serafim Ivanovich Chaika * Ivan Savkin as Stepan Kazanets * Vladimir Vysotsky as Andrey * Inna Churikova as Varvara * Konstantin Sorokin as Sliva * Lyudmila Marchenko as Taisya * Zoya Fyodorova as head of crooks in the market * Sergey Filippov as crook in the market * Valery Nosik as Gregory, Varvara's husbandThe Cook (1966) Full Cast / Crew * Eduard Abalov as crook in the market == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1965 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Edmond Keosayan
title: The Cook (1965 movie)
